title: Cache thumbnail images
description: Thumbnails are currently fetched multiple times per sessions. Caching them on your device improves responsiveness and saves bandwidth.

title: Expositions
description: Present images shown at a club exposition in a Portfolio like way. Each such Portfolio would contain images by different photographers in a controllable order.

localizedDescription.value: Present images shown at a club exposition in a Portfolio like way. Each such Portfolio would contain images by different photographers in a controllable order.
Toon beelden van meerdere makers die tijdens een expositie vertoond zijn. De volgorde van de beelden is belangrijk.

title: Delete photo clubs
description: Allow deletion of photo clubs (like the Test Photo Clubs). This would include deleting their membership list. Entries on the Who's Who page are not deleted.

title: Index of Clubs
description: Host list of photo clubs on a server. Allows clubs to be added/removed without updating software. Each entry would include: name, coordinates, town, country, URL of membership list and URL of club website.

title: Maps
description: Add names of clubs to pins on the maps of the Photo Clubs screen. Possibly add marker showing the user's location.

title: Mark portfolios that changed
description: Show (using a 'badge') when a Portfolio has been updated since it was last visited. Could be extended with an actual notification.

title: Rename app
description: Change app name from Photo Club Waalre to a new name not associated with any particular photo club.

title: Simple onboarding of new clubs
description: Onboarding of clubs should not require a new app release. Instead, all required information is fetched from the respective club websites. The data format should be simple/safe. We think this is needed to get widespread adoption across photo clubs.
